knimeNode.name: RDKit Molecule Catalog Filter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Filters a list of molecules by applying filters defined in standard catalogs: PAINS, PAINS A, PAINS B, PAINS C, BRENK, NIH, ZINC or ALL.

fullDescription.intro: Filters a list of molecules by applying filters defined in standard catalogs: PAINS, PAINS A, PAINS B, PAINS C, BRENK, NIH, ZINC or ALL. The second output table lists very detailed the reasons why a molecule was filtered out. It gives the option to generate one or more atom lists columns with the indexes of the atoms that were responsible for a filter rule to match. This makes it possible to use the RDKit Molecule Highlighting node to color the associated substructures, even with different colors based on the catalog that defined the rule.
fullDescription.option: The input column with RDKit Molecules.
Define which filter catalogs shall be used for filtering.
Column names for the second (filtered out) table are automatically assigned, but a prefix can be assigned, which makes it possible to run this node sub-sequentially with different filters.

Option to tell, if atom lists of matching filters shall be generated or not, and if they should be combined in a single column for all matches, or if separate atom list columns should be generated, one per filter catalog.

ports.inPort: Input table with RDKit Molecule to be filtered
ports.outPort: Molecules which have not been filtered out
Molecules which have been filtered out
